landing.heroText: With ThriveAlive.Ai, you get a consultant in your pocket: instant access to structured tools and subject-matter experts to help you chart your course, take action, and reach your goals
landing.howTextOne: Discover the values, aspirations, and motivations that guide your life.
landing.howTextTwo: Receive AI-powered guidance from brand expert, Pete Canalichio, tailored to your unique journey.
landing.howTextThree: Use the insights to shape not just your finances, but your future.
